lead_paragraph: Chase Stuart contributes to the Pro-Football-Reference.com blog and to Footballguys.com.
snippet: The Lions' Matt Stafford and the Jets' Mark Sanchez will face each other for the first time Sunday. They were each among the top five picks of last year's draft.
abstract: The Lions' Matt Stafford and the Jets' Mark Sanchez will face each other for the first time Sunday. They were each among the top five picks of last year's draft.
